OOC: didnt know there was ash, But I do now

Wildrider looks around in the ash, not sure if he hit his target. He then
hears a whisling sound and a missile hits him, the explosion sends him
back, one of his horns falls off as his face is mutilated, "yah, I missed
that kind of pain" he screams transforming to car mode and driving out of
the way avoiding the other missile and the tank.
